class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.ConfigSetting
class.query: select cs from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.ConfigSetting cs where cs.objId = :userId or cs.objId IS NULL and cs.accessLevel = :accessLevel and cs.activityStatus = 'Active'

select cs from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.ConfigSetting cs join cs.property prop join prop.module module where (cs.objId =:userId or cs.objId IS NULL) and cs.accessLevel = :accessLevel and cs.activityStatus = 'Active' and module.name = :name
select cs from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.ConfigSetting cs where cs.activityStatus = 'Active' and cs.id > :settingId

select cs from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.ConfigSetting cs join cs.property prop join prop.module module where cs.objId = :userId and cs.accessLevel = 'User' and prop.name = :propName and cs.activityStatus = 'Active' and module.name = :moduleName
